code:
---
config:
  theme: redux
---
flowchart TD
    A1[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> A[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    A --> B[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    B -- Memory read successful --> C[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    B -- Memory access error --> D[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    D --> E[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    E --> F[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    C --> G{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}
    G -- Yes --> H[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    G -- No --> I[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    I --> J[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    J --> K[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    K --> A
    H --> L{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}
    L -- Immediate, Implied, Accumulator --> M[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    L -- Zero Page, Indexed, Absolute --> N[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    L -- Indirect, Relative --> O[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    M --> P[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    N --> Q[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    O --> R[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    P --> S[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    Q --> S
    R --> S
    S --> T{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}
    T -- "Arithmetic/Logical - e.g., ADC, AND" --> U[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    T -- "Load/Store - e.g., LDA, STA" --> V[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    T -- "Branch - e.g., BEQ, JMP" --> W[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    T -- "Stack - e.g., PHA, RTS" --> X[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    T -- "System - e.g., BRK, RTI" --> Y[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    U --> Z[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    V --> Z
    W --> AA[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    X --> Z
    Y --> AB[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    AA -- Met --> AC[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    AA --  Not mett --> AD[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    AC --> Z
    AD --> Z
    AB -- Interrupt triggered --> AE[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    AB -- Return from interrupt --> AF[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    AE --> AG[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    AF --> Z
    Z --> AH[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    AG --> AH
    AH --> AI{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}
    AI -- "NMI pending - e.g., PPU VBlank" --> AJ[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    AI -- "IRQ pending - e.g., mapper, APU" --> AK[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    AI -- No interrupts --> AL[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    AJ --> AM[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    AK --> AN[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    AL --> AO[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    AM --> AO
    AN --> AO
    AO --> AP{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}
    AP -- Yes --> AQ[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    AQ --> AR[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    AR --> AS[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    AS --> AT[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    AT --> AU[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    AP -- No --> AU
    AU --> A
    style AI stroke:#000000
repo_description: A Nintendo Entertainment System Emulator written in Swift
